channel.title: Error when opening client for first time
channel.description:
Hey I was wondering if someone could help me?
I keep getting this error :/
error_game_js5connect
I know this error involes the IP but where can I find to change it? (I know it's either in loader.java or client.java) if you could show me that would be great! Also the node like Static IP = LocalHost = "" Thank you
SKYPE: TheLegitZombie
(PS: I am using matrix 718 client and rune evolution 714 source)

item.title: Error when opening client for first time
item.dc:creator: @ZombieMuchBro ZombieMuchBro
item.description:
@ZombieMuchBro wrote:

I don’t know where to change it , that’s the problem.

Read full topic
item.source: Error when opening client for first time

item.title: Error when opening client for first time
item.dc:creator: @xXSh0ckXx xXSh0ckXx
item.description:
@xXSh0ckXx wrote:

[quote=“ZombieMuchBro, post:4, topic:525925”]oh sorry about this… I’ll repost in right section.

I tried running my server before my client…[/quote]
Yes, it’s fine. Run your server, then start your client

EDIT: did you changed the ip to 127.0.0.1 ? Dont forget to compile after that

Read full topic
